q: "I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better!" Eric Schmidt wrote in Google Inc. 's official blog post. Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt , a former Novell executive, has led the company since 2001. "We have a wide variety of legislative tools available." reports, Mike Pence has raised his profile a number of times in recent years- when he was elected chairman of the the House conservative caucus in 2005, when he ran for House minority leader in 2006, and when he won election as House Republican Conference chairman in 2008 to become the third-ranking Republican in the chamber. He left that post after the GOP won control of the chamber in the Nov. 2 election. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. The move is an example of Steve Ballmer 's commitment last year that the company is "all in" on cloud computing.
